description:
Kowata Akane is http://anidb.net/ch76922 [Makoto]`s older sister and a full-fledged witch. She contrasts with Makoto in both personality and appearance. While Makoto is polite and softly spoken, Akane is more brash and loud-mouthed, though still just as kind. She cares deeply for Makoto and takes time off from her travels all around the world to visit and check on her sister regularly. She has a white cat familiar named http://anidb.net/ch80601 [Keny].
Source: Wikipedia, edited.
name: Kowata Akane
